entry.name: required
entry.title: required method
entry.longdesc:
Return false if the element is empty (text input) or unchecked (radio/checkbox) or nothing selected (select).
Works with text inputs, selects, checkboxes and radio buttons.
To force a user to select an option from a select box, provide an empty option element like <option value="">Choose...</option>

signature.desc: Makes the element required, depending on the result of the given expression.

argument.name: dependency-expression
argument.desc:
An expression (String) that is evaluated in the context of the element's form, making the field required only if the expression returns more than one element.
Very often your expression will use selector filters such as #foo:checked, #foo:filled, #foo:visible. This plugin provides custom selectors for that purpose.

signature.desc: Makes the element required, depending on the result of the given callback.

argument.name: dependency-callback
argument.desc: The function is executed with the element as it's only argument: If it returns true, the element is required.

example.desc: Makes "field" always required. Nothing and blanks are invalid.
Makes the gender radio buttons required.
Makes details required only if #other is checked.
Makes "parent" required only if age is below 13.
